stimulusHtml: A rocket lifts a payload upward from the surface of Earth. The radius of Earth is R, and the weight of the payload on the surface of Earth is W. The force of Earth’s gravity on the payload is  W 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@394F@  when the rocket’s distance from the center of Earth is
choicesHtml: 2 2 R MathType@MTEF@5@5@@39FC@
